content.prompt: A launcher can launch a projectile with initial speed v0 from the edge of a tabletop at any angle between 0° and 90° above the horizontal. How does the horizontal component of the projectile’s velocity change as a function of launch angle as the angle is increased from 0° to 90° ?

choices.label: It decreases from a maximum value to zero at a constant rate.
It decreases from a maximum value to zero at a rate with an increasing magnitude.
It increases from zero to a maximum value at a constant rate.
It increases from zero to a maximum value at a rate with an increasing magnitude.

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
